attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment [ hanging] for selective cases , e.g. Murder of a child < 16 yoa , and for police officers, and exceptional case [ multiple murders]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its about time "The punishment fitted the crime". If it's good enough in the Bible to say "tooth for a tooth", then it's good enough for society.
Take a life, pay with your own!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
